# AVAssetWriter.Status.failed

**Case**

The asset writer fails to write the output file.

## Declaration

```swift
case failed
```

## Discussion

Query the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetWriter/error] property value to determine the cause of the failure.

## Status values

- **AVAssetWriter.Status.unknown**: The asset writer’s status isn’t known.
- **AVAssetWriter.Status.writing**: The asset writer is writing.
- **AVAssetWriter.Status.completed**: The asset writer finishes writing successfully.
- **AVAssetWriter.Status.cancelled**: The asset writer canceled the writing operation.
